originalText.text: I left active duty after six years of service last summer and returned to NYC with little to no assistance, guidance or direction on how I can adapt to leading a civilian life again. In a very vulnerable time for me, the NYC Veterans Alliance and it's incredible staff introduced me to a passionate and caring environment where I found purpose again. From their advocacy work to their ongoing Mutual Aid program, the Alliance has dedicated themselves to the needs of the NYC veteran community, a passion I haven't seen before being a born and raised New Yorker. This is an organization you can count on.

text.text: I left active duty after six years of service last summer and returned to NYC with little to no assistance, guidance or direction on how I can adapt to leading a civilian life again. In a very vulnerable time for me, the NYC Veterans Alliance and it's incredible staff introduced me to a passionate and caring environment where I found purpose again. From their advocacy work to their ongoing Mutual Aid program, the Alliance has dedicated themselves to the needs of the NYC veteran community, a passion I haven't seen before being a born and raised New Yorker. This is an organization you can count on.

originalText.text:
The NYC Veterans Alliance is very helpful in assisting veterans in many ways specially during this pandemic.
They also help with veterans claims, Housing, meals and even checking on veterans by making phone contact to check on their wellness and needs.
In these hard times they are truly a great help to veterans in many different ways.
Thank You for all you do !

originalText.text: NYC Veterans Alliance has a great base of Veterans that represent the community well in such a large city. They’ve helped me navigate the VA system well in NuC and have many volunteers that go out of their way to help their local community whether it’s part of the veteran community or not. They’ve also helped many veterans during the peak of COVID-19 get the assistance they need.

text.text: NYC Veterans Alliance has a great base of Veterans that represent the community well in such a large city. They’ve helped me navigate the VA system well in NuC and have many volunteers that go out of their way to help their local community whether it’s part of the veteran community or not. They’ve also helped many veterans during the peak of COVID-19 get the assistance they need.

originalText.text: The New York City Veterans Alliance is staffed with people who truly care about connecting Veterans to the resources they need. When COVID-19 struck, creating even more daily isolation, they even altered their operations to conduct thousands of telephone calls to check in with Veterans.

text.text: The New York City Veterans Alliance is staffed with people who truly care about connecting Veterans to the resources they need. When COVID-19 struck, creating even more daily isolation, they even altered their operations to conduct thousands of telephone calls to check in with Veterans.

originalText.text:
NYC Veterans Alliance has always been there to help All Veterans at All Times.
I am a Past-president of Bklyn Chapter # 72 Vietnam Veterans of America and know first hand the great job they do.
